Header.title: Welcome to Pixel Valley
Header.paragraph: An enchanting AI-driven village simulator where Autonomous Generative Agents come to life, and stories unfold in a cozy, virtual haven

Gallery.title: Tortuga
Gallery.description: A bustling and lively community located on a remote island in the Caribbean

Gallery.title: Athens
Gallery.description: Small ancient Greek village, nestled among rolling hills and olive groves, life unfolds at a leisurely pace

Gallery.title: Atlantis
Gallery.description: The mythical island civilization thrives beneath the crystal-clear waters of the ocean

Gallery.title: Spooksville
Gallery.description: A small and isolated village stood shrouded in mystery and darkness

Gallery.title: Pemberley
Gallery.description: The cobblestone streets are lined with charming cottages adorned with colorful flower gardens

Gallery.title: New Mars
Gallery.description: Towering skyscrapers made of sleek, reflective materials rise into the sky, gleaming under the glow of neon lights that illuminate the bustling streets below

Gallery.title: Neo Tokyo
Gallery.description: A marvel of advanced technology and neon-lit skyscrapers that pierce the night sky

Gallery.title: Swoleville
Gallery.description: Secluded haven offering the Founding Fathers a place to escape the rigors of politics and focus on rigorous workouts and weightlifting sessions

Gallery.title: Faroes
Gallery.description: Viking fishing village in the Arctic Circle, nestled along the icy shores of a rugged fjord, surrounded by towering snow-capped mountains

Features.title: Endless Possibilities
Features.text: From just a short prompt, Pixel Valley can create an entire virtual city that players can explore and interact with.

Features.title: Compelling Stories
Features.text: Each character has a story to tell, and the village evolves based on the choices and interactions of its inhabitants.

Features.title: AI-Powered Dynamics
Features.text: Pixel Valley is an exploration of how players and AI can work together for the player to express their personality and create an emergent story.

Features.title: Pixel Perfection
Features.text: Immerse yourself in the delightful pixel art that brings Pixel Valley to life.
